src:
Na balkonu v najlonski vreči našli truplo s porezanim vratom
03 Nov 2019, 16:46 by Spletno uredništvo

V Ulici del Veltro pri Sv. Jakobu v Trstu so v soboto ponoči našli truplo 75-letnega moškega, poroča Primorski dnevnik.



Fotografija je simbolična. Foto: Primorski dnevnik

TRST > Truplo so našli na balkonu stanovanja v tretjem nadstropju, kjer je priletnik živel. Ležalo je v najlonski vreči, pri vratu pa je bilo porezano.
Gasilci so v stanovanje vstopili po balkonu, potem ko so sosedje obvestili policijo. Pokojnika namreč dalj časa niso opazili. Zaradi intervencije gasilcev, je bila ulica nekaj ur zaprta.
V stanovanju naj bi po poročanju portala triesteprima.it našli številne krvave sledi. Moški naj bi bil mrtev že približno dva tedna. Že dlje časa naj bi bil bolan, imel naj bi tudi težave z vidom. Zanj naj bi skrbela ženska, o kateri zdaj ni ne duha ne sluha.
text:
On the balcony in a nylon bag found a corpse with a cut neck
03 Nov 2019, 16:46 by Online Editorial

On the street del Veltro at Sv. Jacob in Trieste was found dead on Saturday night by the body of a 75-year-old man, Primorski dnevnik reports.



Photography is symbolic. Photo: Coastal Journal

TRIESTE> The corpse was found on the third-floor apartment balcony where the frontier lived. It was in a nylon bag and was cut at the neck.
Firefighters entered the apartment on the balcony after informing neighbors of police. The deceased had not been observed for a long time. Due to the intervention of firefighters, the street was closed for several hours.
The apartment reportedly found numerous bloody footprints in triesteprima.it. The man has been dead for about two weeks. He has been ill for a long time, he also has vision problems. He is to be cared for by a woman who is now neither spirit nor hearing.
